text: The Aragonese Party (, PAR), is a regional political party from Aragon, a northern province of Spain. The party was founded in 1978 with the name Aragonese Regionalist Party. They later changed their name in 1990 to Aragonese Party. However, they kept the initials PAR. == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:1970s establishments in Spain Category:1978 establishments in Europe Category:Political parties in Spain Category:Aragon
title: Aragonese Party
